name: testcoin-buy-skill
description: Purchase-only skill for agents (no faucet step). Use testcoin-faucet-first-skill for faucet-first strategy.
requirements: Always pay exact amount (raw units must match expectedRawAmount)
Use quantity that satisfies product minPurchaseQty and quantityStep
Sui SKU must provide a valid 0x-prefixed Sui address
flow: Pick product and quantity using minPurchaseQty/quantityStep
Send exact stablecoin amount to the provided address
